actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to clause 13 of Rule I. The next meeting is scheduled for 3:30 p.m. on February 21, 2025.

Pursuant to 15 U.S.C. 1024(a), and the order of the House of January 3, 2025, the Speaker appointed the following members of the House to the Joint Economic Committee: Mr. Arrington, Mr. Estes, Mr. Smucker, Ms. Malliotakis, Mrs. Spartz, Ms. Moore of Wisconsin, Mr. Casten and Mr. Min.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to clause 13 of Rule 1, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by the House Chaplain, Chaplain Margaret Grun Kibben.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Riley M. Moore to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
